verbose_text: In agreement with a milestone study revealing how metformin treatment can promote neurogenesis from endogenous adult stem cells XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, our findings confirm also that metformin treatment preserves and somewhat increases the occurrence of neuroepithelial like tissues during iPS differentiation in vivo.
evidence: metformin treatment preserves and somewhat increases the occurrence of neuroepithelial-like tissues during iPS differentiation
